channel.title: Posts on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: Creating a safe (and functional) RE environment on Apple Silicon - VMWare Fusion
item.description: This blog post will guide you through the key programs and downloads required to successfully set up a functional and safe malware environment on M series MacBooks using VMWare Fusion.

item.title: You make me WannaSmile
item.description: Analysis of ‘WannaSmile’ ransomware using dnSpy to pull apart and understand the behaviour and crypto functions used by this binary to encrypt machines.

item.title: Starting Small: Analysis of recent vjw0rm variant
item.description: Analysis of a recent variant of vjw0rm. I walk through my approach to analysing the sample, the challenges I faced in completing the task, resources I leveraged to overcome these and finally the lessons I learned along the way.

item.title: An Introduction
item.description: An introductory post outlining the purpose of this blog, my background and a small dedication to those who inspired me.
